branding.tagline: Monitor and Explore your BigQuery Usage and Performance

CONNECTION.label: Connection Name
CONNECTION.description: Enter the name of the Looker connection to use

SCOPE.label: BigQuery Admin Project
SCOPE.description: Table from which jobs data will be sourced, either 'PROJECT' or 'ORGANIZATION' per the options described at https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/information-schema-jobs

PII_QUERY_TEXT.label: Possible PII Handling
PII_QUERY_TEXT.description: Whether/how to expose strings/numbers that may be embedded in query text or query plans (which might sometimes contain PII). Valid values are: SHOW or HIDE.

BILLING_PROJECT_ID.label: Billing Project ID
BILLING_PROJECT_ID.description: This is used to reference Capacity Commitment data (for flat-rate billing) to compare slot usage against

RESERVATION_ADMIN_PROJECT.label: Reservation Admin Project
RESERVATION_ADMIN_PROJECT.description: May be different than Billing Project ID, used when querying RESERVATIONS_BY_<SCOPE> Data

MAX_JOB_LOOKBACK.label: Max Job Lookback
MAX_JOB_LOOKBACK.description: Number and datepart supported by https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/reference/standard-sql/timestamp_functions#timestamp_sub. Example: '8 HOUR'. This is maximum amount of time to look backwards in job data to find jobs that may still be open in a filtered window of slot usage
